q: What happens when I Invest AVAX?
a: When you invest your AVAX, your AVAX gets locked into the CoalMine smart contract and rewards you with 8% daily return every day.

q: Can I take my initial AVAX back?
a: Over Time! COAL are not bought, COALs are mined therefore they can't be sold. Once COALs are mined they work for you indefinitely, providing you with an unlimited amount of AVAX at a starting rate of 8% daily.
There is a small 6% dev fee in order to pay for marketing costs and developing the CoalMine ecosystem

q: When is the best time to Mine COAL?
a: Always! No matter when you hire miners, you will begin with a return rate of 8% daily.

q: How often should I compound COAL?
a: We recommend that you compound at least once per day but you are free to do so as often as you wish.

CoalMine are sustained by continued community support, just as every other crypto coin, token or project. The difference is that since there is no token, there is no price to dump. As long as COAL are mining in the contract, there will be rewards!

q: How to use CoalMine on my phone?
a: You can either use an app with a dapp browser and choose the Metamask/Injected option or simply use any browser that you want and choose WalletConnect to connect to your wallet's app on your phone.

q: Is it better to Compound COAL or Collect COAL?
a: By design, Compounding COAL will be more profitable than eating COAL in the long-term.
